tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of undergoing orthodontic treatment at Artize Clinic under the expert care of Dr. Sumit Solanki, and I cannot recommend him highly enough. From the moment I stepped into the clinic, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making me feel comfortable right away.
 Dr. Sumit Solanki himself is not only a skilled orthodontist but also a genuinely caring individual. He took the time to thoroughly explain the treatment plan, patiently answering all my questions and addressing any concerns I had. His professionalism and dedication to his patients' well-being are truly commendable.
Throughout the course of my treatment, Dr. Solanki maintained excellent communication, keeping me informed of progress and what to expect at each stage. This transparency was greatly appreciated and contributed to a smooth and worry-free experience.The clinic itself is modern and well-equipped, creating a pleasant environment for dental care. It's clear that cleanliness and patient comfort are top priorities at Artize Clinic, which added to my overall satisfaction with the experience. I found the services provided by Dr. Solanki to be exceptional. The quality of care and the results achieved far exceeded my expectations, making every penny spent well worth it. 
If you're considering orthodontic treatment in the area, I highly recommend scheduling a consultation with Dr. Sumit Solanki at Artize Clinic. His expertise, combined with the supportive staff and excellent facilities, ensures that you'll receive top-notch care in a friendly and professional setting. I'm thrilled with my results and grateful to Dr. Solanki and his team for their outstanding work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr. Sumit Solanki, for orthodontic treatment and had a very good experience. After understanding the whole problem with my teeth. They suggested me to get orthodontic treatment with braces for approximately 12 months, followed by retaineers for a year. They gave a few options in braces. The best part is that they give you the most effective treatment in very affordable prices plus routine check ups are also there. Now my teeth are absolutely aligned.
I am satisfied with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: recently got a root canal done by Dr Sumit Solanki and it was very well done. I didn't feel any pain and he explained everything before the procedure. He is extremely professional, very humble and understanding. He is very patient and works with your pace.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Best thing about dr sumit solanki is he is polite, understands your concern and always be ready to clear all the queries you got.I had my aligner treatment done by him and it has been a wonderful experience.
I would definitely recommend Dr. Sumit Solanki at artize dental clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am incredibly impressed with Dr. Sumit Solanki orthodontic care. He provided me with few treatment options for my open bite I chose metal braces for my upper and lower teeth. his thorough approach and clear communication made the experience straightforward and reassuring. His staff is friendly and efficient, making each visit a pleasant one. The braces were very effective, and Iâ€™m delighted with the alignment of my teeth.

Doctor calm me down by telling me that it can be treated with braces. It was 18 month treatment with braces and now my son has perfect set of teeth. Thanks to doc sumit.
